Episodes.Title: The Tina Table: The Tables Have Tina-ed
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Gregory Thompson
Episodes.Plot: Tina interviews Mr. Frond about his revolutionary computer game in an attempt to save her school news segment; Bob and Linda make up the plots to popular horror movies they haven't seen to entertain Teddy.

Episodes.Title: Saving Favorite Drive-In
Episodes.Director: Brian LoSchiavo, Simon Chong, Tony Gennaro
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Katie Crown
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Bob comes up with a plan to save the local drive-in theater from closing; Linda accidentally insults another mom on a group text chain; Louise and Gene hide from Tina when they steal some of her favorite candy.

Episodes.Title: Colon-ly the Dronely
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Lindsey Stoddart
Episodes.Plot: Linda drives Teddy to help him pick up Kathleen from her colonoscopy after he hurts himself; the Belcher kids plan to prank a drone that's set to film the school from above.

Episodes.Title: For Whom the Doll Toes
Episodes.Plot: Louise stages a murder mystery in a creepy old dollhouse for reasons she can't explain.

Episodes.Title: Don't Stop Be-Cheesin
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Dan Fybel
Episodes.Plot: Louise trains Tina to be the last student standing in a cheese throwing fight against the other eighth graders; Bob and Teddy teach Linda how to eavesdrop on customers' conversations without getting caught.

Episodes.Title: Hope N' Mic Night
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: The kids want to host an open mic night at the restaurant, but the hidden costs keep mounting and Bob worries it'll ruin them.

Episodes.Title: Boogie Days
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Jon Schroeder
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Bob's past comes back to haunt him when Louise signs up for a father-daughter boogie board contest.

Episodes.Title: They Slug Horses, Don't They?
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Nora Smith
Episodes.Plot: Tina and Louise get into an argument that escalates across several graphic "apology" cards.

Episodes.Title: Dog Christmas Day After Afternoon
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Steven Davis
Episodes.Plot: The Belchers' family trip to see Christmas lights becomes a rescue mission in more ways than one.

Episodes.Title: Advice Things Are Ad-nice
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Holly Schlesinger
Episodes.Plot: Tina becomes the new advice columnist for the school newspaper; Teddy takes on more than he can handle when he volunteers to build a float for the Bounty of the Bay Parade.

Episodes.Title: Mr. Fischoeder's Opus
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Scott Jacobson

Episodes.Title: Like a Candle in the Gym
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Lindsey Stoddart
Episodes.Plot: The Belchers run into Coach Blevins while on a family walk and find him selling sweat-scented candles, which Gene and Louise discover to be a cover for Blevins' scheme to sell sweat samples for DNA mining.

Episodes.Title: Snackface
Episodes.Writer: Loren Bouchard, Jim Dauterive, Rich Rinaldi
Episodes.Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman
Episodes.Plot: Louise starts an illegal snack trade at school with Gene and Tina, but tensions rise when a rival snack business emerges; Bob and Linda face a laptop crisis, forcing them to choose between family memories and bookkeeping records.
